atham guruwarunge aprasanna hasirim (api hamotama wage ekak hari athdakimak thiyanawa kiyala mama hithanawa ), dawasata paya 6k witharak wada karanawa kiya thibena (waradi )aakalpaya, upadhidharinta rassawal denna oone nisa dipu pathwim, deshapalana awashyatha nisa dipu pathwim (uda.

awurudu samaye paribhogikayan miladi ganna aahara drawya pilibanda kalpanakariwa ha wimasilimath wemin miladi ganna lesa shri lanka mahajana saukhya parikshakawarunge sangamaya mahajanathawagen illimak karayi.uthsawa samaya elambaimath samanga thama sangamaye niladharin rata pura aahara drawya pariksha karamin watalim sidu karana bawath pasugiya dina kihipayedi sidukala watalimwaladi kal ikuth wu ha pramithiyen thora aahara alewi kala pudgalayanta wiruddhawa katayuthu kala bawath ema sangamaye lekam senarath bandara mahatha pawasayi.me dinawaladi paribhogikayan wisin aahara drawya wadipura miladi ganim sidu karana athara ehidi nishpaditha dinaya, kal ikuth wana dinaya, ehi pramithiya yanadiya pilibanda wimasillak nodakwa miladi ganim sidu karana bawa da ee mahatha penwa deyi.atham aahara drawyawala lebal iwath kara ho wenas kara paribhogikayanta aahara alewi karana bawata da thorathuru labi atha.

thama sathuru rata­wala samanya wasi­yan ghatha­naya kirima sadha­ra­ni­ka­ra­naya kala osama ama­ri­kawa wani islam wirodhi rata­wala aarthi­kaya winasha kirima ema rata­wa­lata wiru­ddhawa sidu kala haki hondama satana bawa pawa­siya. 1988 di al-kayida sanwi­dha­naya pihi­tuwa ganima nisa osama bin ladan sawudi­yen pitu­wa­hal kale ya.

ada jawipeya muhuna di aththe nila deshapalana pakshayak lesa pawathna kramayata anugatha wime enam somawanshawadayata purna lesa yatath wime prathiwipakayantaya. 1994di thoragath mawathe somawansha saha anugamikayan thawaduratath idiriyata gaman kalada eya niyojanaya kala balawegayan danatamath ehi aithihasika dura gos thibe. 1994 di nishedhanayak siduwuwada eya dwandathmaka bawa danatamath siduwana deyin pahadiliya.

sahena dawasakata passe me paththata aawe.kohoma unath ape rate pawathina adhyapana kramawedayanam asarthakayi.mama ehema kiyanne guruwarayek lesa labana athdakimuth ekka.katapadamin kiyana giraw hadana kramawedayak misa aakalpa sanwardhanaya wana,kusalatha wardhanaya wena,abhiyoga jayaganna puluwan hakiyawan opananwana kramayak nemeyi meka.ee nisayi usas adhyapanaya labuwath pasugami chinthanayaka jiwath wena pirisak ape rate inne.jarman giya mage yaluwek kiyapu deyak thamayi ehe sisun igena ganna athare wiwidha wruththin walath yedena bawa.samaharu paya dekak paththara wikunanawa.hotel wala wetar wada karanawa.ee kisima rukiyawak pahathya kiyala salakanneth na.ee siyalu rukiya magin yam kisi sewayak laba denawa kiyalayi owun kiyanne.
